#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n,count=0;
    cin>>n;
    string s[n];
    for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
    {
        cin>>s[j];
        count=0;
        for(int k=0;k<s[j].length();k++)
        {
            if(s[j][k]=='T')
                count++;
            else
                count--;
            if(count<0)
                break;
        }
        if(count==0)
            cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
